action.action-desc: Mr. Langworthy (for himself and Ms. Tokuda) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize lifespan respite care programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Lifespan Respite Care Reauthorization Act of 2025.

subsection.text: Section 2901(5) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300ii(5)) is amended by striking unpaid adult and inserting unpaid individual.
